page.title: 03GREENFORD
page.content: Greenford is a town in the Borough of Ealing. Most people come to Greenford for their weekly shopping. Greenford has one big shop which is Woolworth's and it has two supermarkets with fully equipped car parks. It has three or four cafes and one take-away and various kinds of small shops. The transport in Greenford is quite good. There is a bus depot and it has a railway station and a tube station nearby in Perivale. Greenford has many parks to relax in or play in. There is a big park near Perivale Hospital. There is a Roman Catholic Church on Greenford Road, and a synagogue and a Church of England on Oldfield Lane. Ruislip Road has a Babtist, a Methodist and a Salvation Army church. Jarmail Gill,Mohammed Akhtar,K Purewal
